name: TreeSliver
desc: A widget that displays [TreeSliverNode]s that expand and collapse in a vertically and horizontally scrolling [Viewport].

fields.name: tree
fields.desc: The list of [TreeSliverNode]s that may be displayed in the [TreeSliver].

fields.name: treeNodeBuilder
fields.desc: Called to build and entry of the [TreeSliver] for the given node.

fields.name: treeRowExtentBuilder
fields.desc: Called to calculate the extent of the widget built for the given [TreeSliverNode].

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: If provided, the controller can be used to expand and collapse [TreeSliverNode]s, or lookup information about the current state of the [TreeSliver].

fields.name: onNodeToggle
fields.desc: Called when a [TreeSliverNode] expands or collapses.

fields.name: toggleAnimationStyle
fields.desc: The default [AnimationStyle] for expanding and collapsing nodes in the [TreeSliver].

fields.name: indentation
fields.desc: The number of pixels children will be offset by in the cross axis based on their [TreeSliverNode.depth].
